resources.string: City that inspires, flowers and transforms everyday

There are many reasons that make Medellín a privileged destination; the city of eternal spring is in itself a reason: it is its topography, a valley between mountains, the spring weather and the warmth of the paisas
Medellin, capital of Antioquia department, has a pleasant climate of around 24° C; It has modern transport systems like Metro, Metrocable and Tram.

From the mountains that surround the capital of Antioquia Medellin shows how the river runs parallel to the Metro, which connects various points of the city, abounding in parks, libraries, museums and public spaces where various cultural events take place.
